## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Security fix
- [ ] Dependency update

## Risk Assessment

<!-- Mark the appropriate risk level -->

- [ ] **LOW** - Documentation, tests, or minor UI changes with no production impact
- [ ] **MEDIUM** - New features, refactoring, or changes that affect non-critical paths
- [ ] **HIGH** - Breaking changes, database migrations, security fixes, or changes to critical business logic
